flawed_nl_solution:
The flight from NY to Hawaii will take 60 x 11 + 20 = <<60*11+20=860>>860 minutes.
All the activities will take 120 + 240 + 30 + 40 + 70 = <<120+240+30+40+70=500>>500 minutes.
For his nap, he has 860 - 500 = <<860-500=360>>360 minutes.
To convert minutes to hours, he has 360/ 60 = <<360/60=6>>6 hours.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 680, not 860. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
